mapper.select: SELECT missing_id, user_phone, pet_name, pet_age, pet_sex, pet_type, pet_img , CAST(ST_X(location) AS DECIMAL(16,14)) AS 'lat', CAST(ST_Y(location) AS DECIMAL(17,14)) AS 'lon', location_explain, missing_time, missing_notice, missing_date FROM missing WHERE missing_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 72 HOUR;
mapper.insert: insert into missing (missing_id, user_phone, pet_name, pet_age, pet_sex, pet_type, pet_img, location, location_explain, missing_time, missing_notice, missing_date) values ( null, #{user_phone}, #{pet_name}, #{pet_age}, #{pet_sex}, #{pet_type}, #{pet_img}, POINT(#{lat}, #{lon}), #{location_explain}, #{missing_time}, #{missing_notice}, now() )
